ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] spell problems
ygData.msgSnippet: How could you add a skill like senseheading? is there a typed command you can use for senseheading? luv, -Su ... of spell slot) ... heading :) ... slots? ...
ygData.messageBody:
How could you add a skill like senseheading? is there a typed command you
can use for senseheading?
luv,
-Su

>
> that would work or you could use a social button and use the /Cast (number
of spell slot)
>
> i.e /cast 1 to cast the spell in the first slot
>
> that way u can add in things like warnings or other skills like sense
heading :)
>
>
> >From: "Su"
> >Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> >To:
> >Subject: Re: [EverQuest] spell problems
> >Date: Mon, 2 Sep 2002 16:29:32 -0500
> >
> >
> >Do you first put them in the book, and then put them in the spell mem
slots?
> >Then you can hold the left mouse cursor down over them and place them in
the
> >hotkeys.
> >luv,
> >-Su
> >
> >
> > > i'm a new member to everquest i hope you can help me. i can't figure
> > > out how to get the spells onto the hotkeys.
> > >
> > >
